title: Hint
text: Use Newton's second law $$(F=ma)$$ to find the net force required to accelerate the train. Consider friction and the given acceleration.

title: Steps
text: Step 1: Apply Newton's second law $$(F=ma)$$ to find the net force required to accelerate the train. Step 2: Subtract the force of friction from the net force to find the force each engine must exert. Step 3: Clearly show all calculations and units.
